columns.text:
With an amazing sundeck, situated on the upper level, Heart is a double bed Suite offering uninterrupted views of the Caldera cliff side and sunset, all year round. It consists of a unique style corridor bathroom with amazing view over the caldera and the Aegean Sea. Lay at your bed and watch the sunset straight ahead or admire the moon reflection above the sea.

Room total: 22 sq.m
Up to 2 Guests/ Sea view

• Sea view terrace with sun loungers, chairs & table
  • Bedroom with queen size bed
  • Natural full latex mattresses 22cm height
  • Luxury cotton satin bed linens
  • En-suite bathroom with shower
  • Signature bathroom amenities
  • Bathrobes and slippers
  • Hairdryer and ladyâ€™s vanity unit
  • Pool and Beach towels in a beach bag to take
  • Individually controlled Air condition
  • Individually controlled Heating
  • Direct dial telephone
  • Safe Box
  • Free Wi-Fi internet access
  • LCD TV Satellite channels
  • Fully stocked Minibar with complimentary bottles of water
  • Daily maid service
  • Iron, ironing board on request
  • Welcome glasses of sparkling wine
  • A-la-carte American Champagne breakfast served in your own balcony

items.title: Love Suite
items.description: Minimal design with traditional Cycladic features, enjoying views of the caldera, sunset and the sea.

items.seo_title: Love Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Love Suite has a 60 sq.m interior, traditional Cycladic features, a built-in sofa, sundeck & pool, sea & Caldera views. Book this for your honeymoon now!
items.small_info: Up to 4 Guests/ Caldera / Sea View

items.title: Senses Suite
items.description: Honeymoon Senses Suite is the perfect choice for guests who wish to embrace the site of Caldera as well as delightful swimming pool vistas.

SEO.title: Heart Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
SEO.description: The Heart Suite has a double bed, unique corridor bathroom, an amazing sundeck & pool. Sea views from bedroom. Book this for your honeymoon today!
